Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Crystal Sea in Forza d'Agro, you'll be on the beach and close to Church of the Holy Trinity and Letojanni Beach. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Church of Santi Pietro e Paolo d'Agro and Capuchin Monastery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 39 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Crystal Sea in Forza d'Agro, you'll be on the beach and close to Church of the Holy Trinity and Letojanni Beach. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Church of Santi Pietro e Paolo d'Agro and Capuchin Monastery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Church of the Holy Trinity - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Letojanni Beach - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Church of Santi Pietro e Paolo d'Agro - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Capuchin Monastery - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Spisone Beach - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Lido Mazzaro - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Taormina Cable Car - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
San Pancrazio Church - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Porta Messina - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Greek Theatre - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Palazzo dei Congressi - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Palazzo Corvaja - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Museum of Art and Popular Traditions - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi
Taormina Roman Odeon - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi
Chiesa Santa Caterina - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Crystal Sea is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 54.6 km / 33.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
